hints.content:
$822 ={\goldE{?}} + 589$

![A number line with 2 points labeled. An arrow from point 589 to point 822 is labeled, plus question mark.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a2eedb6f46d12bcbbdd7126ba709776626f06186)

Let's start by adding hundreds to ${589}$ until we get as close to  ${822}$ as possible without going over ${822}$.

$\begin{align}
{589} +\purpleD{100}=689\\\\
{689} +\purpleD{100}= 789
\end{align}$

If we add $\purpleD{2 \text{ hundreds}}$, or $\purpleD{2 00}$, we reach $789$. We cannot add any more hundreds without going over ${822}$.

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 589 to a new point 789 labeled, "plus 200"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a351efaf9326f874732631f4d7b67b663f076400)

Next, let's add tens to $789$ until we get as close to  ${822}$ as possible without going over ${822}$.

$\begin{align}
789 +\blueD{10}=799\\\\
{799} +\blueD{10}= 809\\\\
{809} +\blueD{10}= 819
\end{align}$

If we add $\blueD{3 \text{ tens}}$, or $\blueD{30}$, we reach $819$. We cannot add any more tens without going over ${822}$.

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 789 to a new point 819 labeled, "plus 30"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/137615dae32f78a18e16bfc1f538b8c0fc939f80)

Finally, how many ones should we add to  $819$ to get to  ${822}?$

$\begin{align}
819+\greenD{1} &=820\\\\
820+\greenD{2} &=822
\end{align}$

We add $\greenD{3\text{ ones}}$.

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 819 to point 822 labeled, "plus 3"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d1f036e4bdc3ccbf6d5f8bc61b529d4885029059)

We added $\purpleD{2 \text{ hundreds}}$, $\blueD{3 \text{ tens}}$, and $\greenD{3\text{ ones}}$ to ${589}$ to get to ${822}$.

$\purpleD{2 00}+\blueD{3 0}+\greenD{3}=\goldE{233}$

![The number line with all of the arrows shown. The original arrow from point 589 to point 822 is labeled, "plus 233." The arrows spans the arrows labeled "plus 200," "plus 30," and "plus 3."](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/5d51bdd9b7eb28dad098f1d169d4c956981fe375)

question.content:

$822 = {}$ [[â˜ƒ numeric-input 1]] ${} + 589$
